properties.NAME: Blue Haze Farm
properties.DESCRIPTION: We are a small family run farm that offers produce while in season including apples, berries, tomato's, persimmons and figs, and frozen cold pressed UV pasteurized apple juice (while supplies last) year round. We also house bee's for a local keeper and offer their honey and wax for sale while in season.

properties.NAME: Glen Willow Plant Exchange
properties.ADDRESS: 950 Glen Willow Pl. Its actually in the middle of the cul de sac, in the round about.
properties.DESCRIPTION: It's a plant exchange that includes plants, seeds, fresh herbs, and any gardening supplies. Please bring something to exchange. It is also in between Glen Willow's Community Gardens, that  is for residents only. Pots, twine, and children's toys are for Community gardens use only. Please leave the jars for fresh herbs at the stand. You can follow my blog every Monday on Facebook. Glen Willow Plant Exchange. It includes plants, seeds and fresh herbs of the week.
properties.HOURS: All day. Fresh herbs are usually put out around 10 am.

Replenish your store of wonderful homemade jams, jellies and canned goods, buy baked goods, find bedding plants for the garden or a bouquet to take home, and discover fine handmade crafts. This market takes place June 8th, July 13th, and August 10th from 10am to 1pm.

properties.NAME: Metchosin Farm

A full selection of our seeds is available on our farm website, and customers can choose 'in-store pickup' as their shipping option to arrange collecting their order here at the farm.

properties.NAME: Urban Forage
properties.ADDRESS: 496a Chapel Heights Drive (home office as we are online only)
properties.DESCRIPTION: Our artisan heat & serve meals are crafted with care and then immediately frozen to preserve their flavour, freshness and nutrition. They are made using perfectly honed recipes with whole foods that are sourced from as close to home as possible. We partner with a number of local farmers and artisans working with the seasons to create amazing food. This is our promise to you. You’re gonna love it!

properties.NAME: White's Greens
properties.DESCRIPTION: Farm selling fruits, vegetables, eggs and sometimes goat, beef and/or chicken

properties.NAME: Wind Whipped Farm
properties.ADDRESS: Wind Whipped Farm, 4645 B, William Head Rd, Victoria, BC V9C 3Y7
properties.DESCRIPTION: Farm selling a wide range of vegetables and some fruit. Our produce is available through The Local Food Box program and at the Wind Whipped Farmstand
properties.HOURS: From June until the end of October our farmstand are open everday from 10am to 5 pm. From November until the end of May our farmstand is open Friday to Sunday, from 10 am until 5pm

properties.NAME: West Shore Food Share
properties.ADDRESS: Church of the Advent, 510 Mt. View Avenue, Colwood
properties.DESCRIPTION: This program is a collaboration between a local resident and Church of the Advent, which takes “unsellable” items from a grocery store and gives them away for free. This is a pick up location only, they do not deliver and the food goes quickly. Donations will also be gratefully accepted on Fridays to support the work of this important resource for food insecure people living in our community.
